[Home](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/index.md) >> Class: [Risk](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/tree/pages/docs/Risk/index.md) >> Individual ID:PBN__Risk_9113 

# __Transmission of respiratory droplets carrying sars-cov-2 prompted by airflow generated by air-conditioning.__

## Articles mentionning the risk

* [Guo_review_2021](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Article/PBN__Article_478.md)

## Mitigations of this risk

* [Optimize air-conditioning systems to minimize airflow and recirculation of air.](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Mitigation/PBN__Mitigation_11011.md)

## Name of the risk

Increased risk of SARS-CoV-2 transmission in indoor spaces with air-conditioning.

## People affected by this risk

* [Occupants of indoor spaces with air-conditioning](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Stakeholder/PBN__Stakeholder_7429.md)

## Stakeholders who can mitigate this risk

* [Building owners](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Stakeholder/PBN__Stakeholder_80.md)
* [Hvac system operators](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Stakeholder/PBN__Stakeholder_6522.md)

## Technologies linked to the risk

* [Air quality sensors](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Technology/PBN__Technology_430.md)
* [And smart ventilation solutions](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Technology/PBN__Technology_10797.md)
* [Hvac control systems](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/Technology/PBN__Technology_10798.md)

## This Risk belongs to this RiskGroup

* [Public health risks](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/RiskGroup/PBN__RiskGroup_3.md)

## This Risk belongs to this RiskSubgroup

* [Poor vector-borne diseases control](https://github.com/mm80843/T3.5/blob/pages/RiskSubgroup/PBN__RiskSubgroup_6.md)
